answers.answer: Doing great so far! Only 8 weeks and 5 days to go!
I am doing well! Due June 25!! Counting down to meet her!!
Patiently waiting!! I'll be 8 months Thursday so it's coming along i think. Pelvic pains, back pains etc. Is still taking over but its getting close

59 days to go. Can't get out of my bed very well lol, I've had rib pain right along and he's dropped a bit and it hasn't relieved. It hurts worse when I lay on my side, but I can't sleep on my back or I tell my circulation is getting comprised. I wish I had a recliner, I would sleep in that.

69 days and counting. I feel pretty good. Lost my need to eat every five minutes and I am short of breathing doing everything and nothing. Tons and tons of baby movement (starting to get painful). Other than that, I am getting everything ready for the baby and getting overly excited to hold her for the first time!!! Yay!
74 days to go. Due June 27th. This is my 4th baby and my 2nd son. Hubby and I are getting so excited and can't wait to hold him. :)
52 more days til my little girl is here!! I'm keeping myself as busy as possible to make the time fly...
58 more days to go, cant wait to meet him & enjoying his weird movements(: love it
June 12th and cannot wait to meet her. In very uncomfortable sleeping and gestational diabetes is no fun. Other than that just excited!!!
Beyond excited!!! Are yall all nesting yet cause its about to drive me nuts lol!!!!!
June 14th, its a boy patiently waiting for his arrival.

question: How are u all doin??? Hope all is well!!!
title: june mamas!!!
